title: Penalty for violations
context: §264-12 Penalty for violations. Any person, including any public officer or employee who violates section 264-6, shall be fined not more than $250 or imprisoned not more than three months, or both. [L 1967, c 163, pt of §2; HRS §264-12] Cross References Classification of offense and authorized punishment, see §§701-107, 706-640, 663.
